item.title: URL Containers
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: The push to have smaller, lighter, faster containers has produced some interesting ideas. With Mirage OS the container has become a “unikernel“. Now imagine fast forwarding this idea to an extreme end. You get this: A unikernel experiment: A VM for every URL. It is just what it sounds like, spinning up a tiny container […]
item.content:encoded:
The push to have smaller, lighter, faster containers has produced some interesting ideas. With Mirage OS the container has become a “unikernel“.

Now imagine fast forwarding this idea to an extreme end. You get this: A unikernel experiment: A VM for every URL.

It is just what it sounds like, spinning up a tiny container for every URL on your site.
